name: has-values
description: Returns true if any values exist, false if empty. Works for booleans, functions, numbers, strings, nulls, objects and arrays.

0.1.1.name: has-values
0.1.1.description: Returns true if a value exists, false if empty. Works for booleans, functions, numbers, strings, nulls, objects and arrays. Other libs do this, but I needed one that would optionally _not_ treat zero as empty. Also, this works with booleans and other valu
